name: Astroraft
description:
This game has been made in less than 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 Jam (Unfortunatly I have missed the upload deadline so is not available on ldjam.com).

Astroraft is/will be a crafting/survival game situated in the lonely depths of space. You are the solo survivor of a ship malfunction that has left you stuck in a loop of a nearby planet. Story will be more fleshed out in a later update.

How to Play:

  • Use [1/2/3/4/5/6] to select certain tools.
  • Use the Hook [4] to hook items such as scrap and O2 tanks.
  • Consume O2, water and food to survive,
  • Build floor panels using scrap
  • Build storage structures using Scrap, Copper Wire, Rubber & Glass
  • Try not to die!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Scroll wheel - Change tool
  • 1/2/3/4/5/6 - Change tool
  • Context sensitive input is displaced on screen.

Made by myself using assets from the following creators:

  • ESSPLASHKID
  • PIXELBURNER
  • MOJO-STRUCTURE
  • DACTILARDESIGN
  • CASUAL2D

I'd like to continue this project forward, if you have any suggestions please comment in the below section or message me on twitter here.

I am also remaking a lot of the game now the game jam is over, including new movement, new inventory systems and a better hook mechanic.
